conclusion: A square metal coil with side length L and N turns rotates with constant angular velocity Ï‰ around axis OO', which is perpendicular to the magnetic field B. Side ab is at distance L/4 from the axis OO'.

conclusion: The axis OO' does not pass through the center of the square, as side ab is at a distance L/4 from the axis.
